name: Living Quarters
description: There are people sleeping here, and you can hear snoring.

items.name: Uniform
items.description: A uniform given to members of the galley staff

actionResponse.look: A uniform given to members of the galley staff
actionResponse.get: You put the uniform in your inventory.
actionResponse.use: You put on the uniform. Very fancy!

name: Inventory
description: The players current inventory of items

name: South Sky Bridge
description:
As you walk into the Sky Bridge, the airlock shuts behind you. 
You see spacesuits prepared for use.

items.name: Spacesuit
items.description: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.

actionResponse.look: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.
actionResponse.get: You put the spacesuit in your inventory.

name: Sector 1
description:
There are people passing by, with the gym to the west 
& pressurized gardens to the east, and sector 2 to the north, south sky bridge to the south.

name: Pressurized Garden
description:
The space is filled with edible and medicinal plants. 
You see a gardener watering some vegetables.

characters.name: Gardener
characters.description: They seem friendly, but they have a lot of dirt on their hands.

actionResponse.look: They seem friendly, but they have a lot of dirt on their hands.

items.name: Milk
items.description: This Milk must be plant-based.

actionResponse.look: This Milk must be plant-based.
actionResponse.get: You put the Milk in your inventory for later. Hope it doesn't spill...

name: Gym
description:
A fitness fanatic is doing pull-ups nearby. 
The weight racks look secure, but you never feel certain…

actionResponse.look: They're really buff!

items.name: Butter
items.description: This is a good source of calories.

actionResponse.look: This is a good source of calories.
actionResponse.get: You put the Butter in your inventory for later. What if it melts?

name: Sector 2
description:
There are people passing by, with the Living quarters to the west, 
bathrooms to the east, sector 1 to the south, and mess hall to the north.

name: Bathrooms
description: Looks like a normal bathroom.

name: Mess Hall
description:
There are people eating, with the kitchen to the east, 
sector 3 to the north, sector 2 to the south, and nothing to the west.

characters.name: Cadet
characters.description: They seem young to be wearing a military uniform.

actionResponse.look: They seem young to be wearing a military uniform.

items.name: Tortillas
items.description: These look nice and fresh.

actionResponse.look: These look nice and fresh.
actionResponse.get: You put the Tortillas in your inventory for later.

name: Kitchen
description:
The Head Chef is calling out orders to other Kitchen staff, 
and has a recipe for you to gather ingredients and cook for Mess Hall diners tonight. 
The Mess Hall is to the west, and nothing else surrounds the Kitchen.

items.name: Snacks
items.description: These look tasty.

actionResponse.look: These look tasty.
actionResponse.get: You put the snacks in your inventory for later.

characters.name: Head Chef
characters.description: The Head Chef is wearing a white chef uniform and a big floppy hat.

actionResponse.look: The Head Chef is wearing a white chef uniform and a big floppy hat.

items.name: Space Spaghetti Recipe
items.description: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Noodles, Martian Meatballs, Tomato Sauce

actionResponse.look: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Noodles, Martian Meatballs, Tomato Sauce
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Lunar Lamb Recipe
items.description: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Butter, Pepper, Lunar Lamb Chops

actionResponse.look: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Butter, Pepper, Lunar Lamb Chops
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Cosmic Curry Recipe
items.description: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Rice, Tofu, Cosmic Curry Powder

actionResponse.look: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Rice, Tofu, Cosmic Curry Powder
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Terrestrial Fish Tacos Recipe
items.description: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Tortillas, Terrestrial Space Fish, Salsa

actionResponse.look: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Tortillas, Terrestrial Space Fish, Salsa
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Planetary Pancakes Recipe
items.description: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Flying Saucer Flour, Milk, Baking Powder

actionResponse.look: You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! You need: Flying Saucer Flour, Milk, Baking Powder
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

name: Sector 3
description:
There are people walking by, you see something that looks like a door on the floor 
which you’d like to check out sometime, with the Information Center to the west, 
the Medical Bay to the East, Mess Hall to the south, and sector 4 to the north.

name: Bilge
description: It’s an interesting space, lots of under the table trading going on, maybe you could find something interesting here? You can exit (up) to go back to Sector 3.

characters.name: Shadowy Figure
characters.description: The shadows prevent you from getting a clear look at their face.

actionResponse.look: The shadows prevent you from getting a clear look at their face.

items.name: Noodles
items.description: Can’t make spaghetti without the noodles!

actionResponse.look: Can’t make spaghetti without the noodles!
actionResponse.get: You put the noodles in your inventory.

name: Information Center
description: The Information Center is the place to get information on almost anything you’d be curious about. The information center liaison is just the person to talk to in order to check out a GPS for use on the discovery pod. With Sector 3 to the east, nothing else surrounds the Information Center.

characters.name: Information Center Liaison
characters.description: They look like they might have some useful information.

actionResponse.look: They look like they might have some useful information.

items.name: GPS
items.description: A device that can be used to track your location and navigate.

actionResponse.look: A device that can be used to track your location and navigate.
actionResponse.get: You put the GPS in your inventory.

name: Medical Bay
description: There don’t seem to be any patients today. You see a lab tech sweeping the deck. Maybe they know where some ingredients are

actionResponse.look: They seem bored.

items.name: Tofu
items.description: This will be good with some curry powder.

actionResponse.look: This will be good with some curry powder.
actionResponse.get: You put the tofu in your inventory for later.

name: Sector 4
description: There are lots of important people walking by. Better get through here quickly.

name: Command Center
description: This door is locked.

name: Engineering Spaces
description: This door is locked

name: North Sky Bridge
description: As you walk into the Sky Bridge, the airlock shuts behind you. You see spacesuits prepared for use and a Pod Technician taking logs. The Pod Technician might know which planet the ingredient you seek could be on, why don’t we ask him?

items.name: Spacesuit
items.description: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.

actionResponse.look: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.
actionResponse.get: You put the spacesuit in your inventory.

actionResponse.look: Their tool belt looks heavy.

items.name: Key
items.description: This doesn't appear to be a door key.

actionResponse.look: This doesn't appear to be a door key.
actionResponse.get: You pick up the key, which feels surprisingly heavy in your hand.

name: Discovery Pod
description: The doorway to discovery! The discovery pod is your ticket to exploring the many planets this section of the Milky Way has to offer. You’re able to use the GPS to navigate to one of the 5 planets (relatively to the ship)

items.name: Pepper
items.description: Wonder how old this is…

actionResponse.look: Wonder how old this is…
actionResponse.get: You put the pepper shaker in your inventory for later

name: North Volcano Planet
description: This quadrant is home a shiny space rock, maybe it can be traded for something else of value?

items.name: Space Rock
items.description: shiny space rock

actionResponse.look: shiny space rock
actionResponse.get: You put the rock in your inventory. It's heavier than it looks!

name: South Volcano Planet
description: A fiery landscape

characters.name: Random Alien
characters.description: They don't seem very interested in you.

actionResponse.look: They don't seem very interested in you.

monster.name: Lava Monster
monster.description: They probably don't ever get cold.

actionResponse.look: They probably don't ever get cold.

items.name: Martian Meatballs
items.description: You're too afraid to ask what these are made of.

actionResponse.look: You're too afraid to ask what these are made of.
actionResponse.get: You put the meatballs in your inventory.

monster.name: Vine Monster
monster.description: How many vines does it have? Too many to count.

actionResponse.look: How many vines does it have? Too many to count.
They don't look very friendly...

items.name: Giant Snail Shell
items.description: There’s no one living here anymore!

actionResponse.look: There’s no one living here anymore!
actionResponse.get: You put the giant snail shell in your inventory. Ew, slimy!

name: North Snow Planet
description: Super chilly place and you always feel you are ice bucket challenging. Nothing is here except cold wind.

name: South Snow Planet
description: Good place to go skating in case you feel bored. There’s nothing to see here except snow as far the eye can see. There are more quadrants to the North, West & East.

name: West Snow Planet
description: Living here for a long time can help you become a figure skating player since you have nothing to do except skating.

items.name: Snowflake Crystal
items.description: An oddity that won’t melt, but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!

actionResponse.look: An oddity that won’t melt, but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!
actionResponse.get: As you pick up the crystal, you feel a surge of power flow through your body. You put the crystal in your inventory.

name: East Snow Planet
description: Nothing much to this planet other than snow and ice. There are more quadrants to the North, South & West.

monster.name: Ice Monster
monster.description: They look like they could freeze you solid.

actionResponse.look: They look like they could freeze you solid.

items.name: Cosmic Curry Powder
items.description: Curry is perfect for cold weather.

actionResponse.look: Curry is perfect for cold weather.
actionResponse.get: You put the Curry Powder in your inventory for later.

name: North Swamp Planet
description: Nothing here except a spacewalker. There are other quadrants to the South, West & East

characters.name: Spacewalker Felix
characters.description: You don't see a pod anywhere, how did they get here?

actionResponse.look: You don't see a pod anywhere, how did they get here?

name: South Swamp Planet
description: There are other quadrants to the North, West & East. The weather on this planet is humid, and the swamp is a mystery.

monster.name: Swamp Monster
monster.description: You see the monster's eyes peeking out from the swamp.

actionResponse.look: You see the monster's eyes peeking out from the swamp water.

items.name: Terrestrial Space Fish
items.description: This space fish lives on land.

actionResponse.look: This space fish lives on land.
actionResponse.get: You put the fish in your inventory for later.

name: West Swamp Planet
description: Nothing here except an interesting fossil of a frog. There are more quadrants to the North, South & East.

items.name: Frog Fossil
items.description: You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.

actionResponse.look: You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.
actionResponse.get: You put the fossil in your inventory.

items.name: Lightning Glass
items.description: It shines in the light.

actionResponse.look: It shines in the light.
actionResponse.get: You carefully pick up the glass and put it in your inventory.

characters.name: Desert Alien
characters.description: They seem to be handling the heat just fine.

actionResponse.look: They seem to be handling the heat just fine.

monster.name: Sand Monster
monster.description: It's hard to tell where the sand starts and the sand monster ends.

actionResponse.look: It's hard to tell where the sand starts and the sand monster ends.

items.name: Baking Powder
items.description: Does this mean baking powder is made of sand?

actionResponse.look: Does this mean baking powder is made of sand?
actionResponse.get: You carefully scoop up some of the powder into a small container, being careful not to spill any. You put it in your inventory for later.

name: Floating Gardens
description: The floating gardens is the place to meet crewmates from other ships in the fleet! The ships have visited many different parts of the galaxy/universe and some folks might be willing to trade some tasty ingredients for some interesting planet artifacts!

items.name: Flour
items.description: A small satchel of flour that makes your hands powdery.

actionResponse.look: A small satchel of flour that makes your hands powdery.
actionResponse.get: You put the flour in your inventory for later.

characters.name: Spacewalker Sam
characters.description: Their spacesuit is definitely too long for them.

actionResponse.look: Their spacesuit is definitely too long for them.

items.name: Tomato Sauce
items.description: A rich and flavorful tomato sauce, perfect for pasta or as a base for other dishes.

actionResponse.look: A rich and flavorful tomato sauce, perfect for pasta or as a base for other dishes.
actionResponse.get: You put the tomato sauce in your inventory.

actionResponse.look: They love talking about recipes!

items.name: Salsa
items.description: It has some spice to it, but would go great with seafood!

actionResponse.look: It has some spice to it, but would go great with seafood!
actionResponse.get: You put the salsa in your inventory.

characters.name: Spacewalker Kun
characters.description: They might be interested in trading.

actionResponse.look: They might be interested in trading.

items.name: Lunar Lamb Chops
items.description: Several lamb chops, ready to be cooked.

actionResponse.look: Several lamb chops, ready to be cooked.
actionResponse.get: You put the lamb chops in your inventory.

characters.name: Spacewalker Jasper
characters.description: They're always hanging out in the floating garden.

actionResponse.look: They're always hanging out in the floating garden.

items.name: Rice
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice that pairs well with many dishes.

actionResponse.look: A fragrant and flavorful rice that pairs well with many dishes.
actionResponse.get: You scoop up a handful of rice, admiring the way it shimmers in the light. You put the rice in your inventory.
actionResponse.use: You cook the rice to perfection, enjoying the aroma and the delicate flavor.
